Texts.Eng: Day 4 - /nSolid... Metal? That is transparent. Now I thought I had seen everything, but this... this just takes the cake. This stuff is so hard I can't even break through it, but it's also transparent. It's either metal or crystal, I can't tell which. I'm glad it's here though, because I can see some strange monsters on the other side and I don't think they like me. Their little glowing eyes are looking at me...
